snippet.title: How to Setup Monect Gaming Controller on Android | Control any PC Game | Fully Functional Controller
snippet.description:
Hey whats up yo guys, welcome back to another tutorial on how to control literary any kind of PC game using your Android device. The Monect Gaming Controller does this magic and preciously you can keep the control over the game and the Controller itself. The Steering accuracy is pretty much good and it use sensors of your android device.

🔹️GTA Vice City Definitive Edition Layout: https://bit.ly/35xrNnh

Attached files:
▪️Monect Receiver for Windows 10- https://bit.ly/38PNkH8
▪️Monect Controller for Android- https://bit.ly/3721EKB
▪️Gaming Layout for Testing(Direct link in video description)- https://bit.ly/37Lpo9p

Note: 
▪️Layouts are only compatible with v7.3.3 or higher, otherwise will encounter "problem parsing" error.
▪️Seek into 2:20 and see how the layout been installed manually to avoid "import failed" error. 
▪️For most games, the Android device should have Gyroscope sensor in order to function the steering. But also there're some games which doesn't essentially need that sensor (GTA V)

►Leaving a LIKE would always appreciate! 
►Subscribe for latest video uploads! http://bit.ly/29ZRld9

Our social media:
◽Like on Facebook: http://bit.ly/2acp9pO
◽Follow on Twitter: http://bit.ly/6zco6Xb
◽Message on Hangouts: Redux Dreams Lab

#HowTo
#AndroidController
#GamingControllerForPC
#WirelessAndroidControllerPC

Thanks for watching and see you back!
tags: euro truck simulator g29 steering wheel
